book.synopsis: A tenth-anniversary commemorative edition of the award-winning history of America begins with pre-Columbian history and covers a diverse range of events, from the Reconstruction and the life of Helen Keller to the first Thanksgiving and the Mai Lai massacre. Reissue.
book.title_long: Lies My Teacher Told Me: Everything Your American History Textbook Got Wrong
book.dimensions: Height: 9.5 Inches, Length: 6.5 Inches, Weight: 1.7085825305 Pounds, Width: 1.5 Inches
